package-manager.name: pkgadd
package-manager.title: OpenSSL SSL/TLS Crypto Toolkit
package-manager.description: The OpenSSL Project is a collaborative effort to develop a robust, commercial-grade, full-featured, and Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS v1) protocols with full-strength cryptography world-wide.

item.para: Security fix for null-pointer assignment during SSL handshake (cf. http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CAN-2004-0079)
Security fix for out-of-bounds read affecting Kerberos ciphersuites (cf. http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CAN-2004-0112)
Fix to earlier ssl3_accept() patch (forgot to remove code replaced by patch)
Merge patches for four security vulnerabilities (http://www.openssl.org/news/secadv_20030930.txt)
In ssl3_accept() (ssl/s3_srvr.c) only accept a client certificate if the server requested one: as stated in TLS 1.0 and SSL 3.0 specifications
